import style from './Card.module.css' const Card = ({id, name, status, species, gender, origin, image, onClose}) => { return (

Name: "{name}"

Status: "{status}"
Species: "{species}"
Gender: "{gender}"
Origin: "{origin}"

{/*

Status: "{status}"

Species: "{species}"

Gender: "{gender}"

Origin: "{origin}"

*/}
); }; export default Card
